tool_description: This API helps to query trusted ratings and reviews for the products, cars and services used every day to create a review site such as : consumerreports.org
name: Consumer Reports
title: Consumer Reports

api_list.name: brands/detail
api_list.description: Get detailed information of a brand

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of brands -> id field returned in .../search endpoint OR brandId field returned in .../products/list, .../products/detail endpoint.

api_list.name: products/get-offers
api_list.description: Get offers from places or sites to buy product

required_parameters.name: modelId
required_parameters.description: The value of _id field returned in .../products/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page index starting from 0, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response, for paging purpose.

api_list.name: products/detail
api_list.description: Get detailed information of a product

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of _id field returned in .../products/list endpoint

api_list.name: products/list

optional_parameters.name: productGroupId
optional_parameters.description: The value of _id field returned in .../product-groups/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response, for paging purpose. Maximum is 250.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page index starting from 0, for paging purpose

api_list.name: product-groups/detail
api_list.description: Get detailed information of product group

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of _id field returned in .../product-groups/list endpoint

api_list.name: product-groups/list
api_list.description: List product groups from categories and types

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response, for paging purpose. Maximum is 500.

optional_parameters.name: productGroupTypeId
optional_parameters.description: The value of productGroupTypeId field returned right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page index starting from 0, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: parentProductGroupId
optional_parameters.description: The value of _id field returned right in this endpoint.

api_list.name: cars/get-images
api_list.description: Get images of car model by year

required_parameters.name: modelYearId
required_parameters.description: The value of modelYearId field returned in .../cars/get-models endpoint

api_list.name: cars/get-recalls
api_list.description: Get recalls relating to a car model year

required_parameters.name: modelYearId
required_parameters.description: The value of modelYearId field returned in .../cars/get-models endpoint

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per response, for paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page index starting from 0, for paging purpose

api_list.name: cars/detail
api_list.description: Get detailed information of car model by year

required_parameters.name: modelYearId
required_parameters.description: The value of modelYearId field returned in .../cars/get-models endpoint

api_list.name: cars/get-models

required_parameters.name: modelId
required_parameters.description: The value of carModels -> id field returned in .../search endpoint

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: Search for brand, car, product, etc... by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with
